name: Bug fix release 2.0.4
body:
## Changes

* Set PlayTools version to 2.0.7: Fixes https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayTools/issues/64.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/compare/2.0.3...2.0.4

name: Bug fix release 2.0.3
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at stable -->

## Changes
* Escape forwards slash by @TheMoonThatRises in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/685
* New Cache System by @amirsaam in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/624
* Better Download Handler (Class) by @amirsaam in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/622
* fix force unwrap nsimage in cacher by @amirsaam in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/652
* Primary App Icon Default by @TheMoonThatRises in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/656
* Replace Usage of `DispatchQueue` with `Task` by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/639
* Fix: Genshin account switcher now works. by @JoseMoreville in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/664
* Fix improper `@MainActor` usage by @TheMoonThatRises in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/662
* Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/650
* Fix clear legacy cache by @TheMoonThatRises in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/660
* add `try await` by @Depal1 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/671
* Fix toast view appearance duration by @TheMoonThatRises in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/678
* Adding Hindi to Languages by @amirsaam in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/679
* Adjust README for 2.0.0 by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/640
* Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/681
* Improve misc settings format by @TheMoonThatRises in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/663
* Fix lag on adding source url by @TheMoonThatRises in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/703
* fix: settings file path by @ohaiibuzzle in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/709
* Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/704
* Add Catalan by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/706
* fixed issue where the command tools wont be recognized if terminal/zs‚Ä¶ by @driff in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/661
* Bump version number to 2.0.3 and build number to 220 by @Depal1 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/720
* Bug fix release 2.0.3 by @Depal1 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/721

## New Contributors
* @driff made their first contribution in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/661

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/compare/2.0.2...2.0.3

name: Bug fix release 2.0.2
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at stable -->

## Changes
- Fix draggable button keymap imports
- Fix PlayTools injection with inject in FAT binaries
- Fix threads in PlayTools injection and removal
- Build with PlayTools 2.0.5
  - Changes in menu bar initialization
- New download state toast

### Changes detailed
* Update version target to 2.0.1 by @Depal1 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/607
* Update Cartfile.resolved to show PlayTools v2.0.4 by @Depal1 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/612
* Fix Crash When Removing/Installing PlayTools by @TheMoonThatRises in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/614
* Update Cartfile.resolved to show PlayTools v2.0.5 by @Depal1 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/619
* Update Inject by @amirsaam in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/623
* Optional ToastView Show + Display Name of the App/Game in Download State by @amirsaam in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/621
* Fix Draggable Button Export by @TheMoonThatRises in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/611
* Fix Installing Legacy Keymap Install Message by @TheMoonThatRises in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/630
* Fix FAT binaries failing to install by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/634
* Update version number and build number for 2.0.2 by @Depal1 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/635
* Update BUG-REPORT template with version 2.0.2 by @Depal1 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/637
* Bug fix release 2.0.2 by @Depal1 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/636
* PlayTools 2.0.5 https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayTools/releases/tag/v2.0.5

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/compare/2.0.1...2.0.2

#### Newer builds with bugfixes
* Nightly build `2.0.2+203` January 3, 2023: https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/compare/2.0.2...8c00aa2

name: Hotfix 2.0.1
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at stable -->

There are important bug fixes on this release. Please update.

## What's Changed
### Exciting New Features üéâ
* Switch from optool to inject by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/554
### Other Changes
* Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/583
* fix!: Shell escape in entitlement handling by @ohaiibuzzle in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/600
* fix!: Remove quotations in fetchEntitlements completely by @ohaiibuzzle in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/602
* Fix IPA Library Warnings by @TheMoonThatRises in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/603
* Fix Negative Frame Width Warning by @TheMoonThatRises in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/604
* Update BUG-REPORT template with version 2.0.1 by @Depal1 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/584
* Paperwork: Cartfile.resolved PlayTools v2.0.3 by @Depal1 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/605
* Bump build number to 185 by @Depal1 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/606
* Hotfix 2.0.1 by @Depal1 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/601


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/compare/2.0.0...2.0.1

name: Release 2.0.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at stable -->

## What's Changed
### Exciting New Features üéâ
* Feat: ‚ú® Custom window resolution is here by @JoseMoreville in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/207
* [Enhancement] Enhanced settings view with locale since #202 by @Wind-Explorer in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/211
* 2.0.0 UI Changes by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/230
* feat: Add support for new app setting plist by @KhoraLee in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/266
* Implement Discord Activity(Rich Presence) by @KhoraLee in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/49
* Clean up code and small refactor by @KhoraLee in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/262
* Changed nightly branch logo by @ZhichGaming in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/123
* Fix automatic screen size detection by @zanderp25 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/331
* Code cleanup: removal of old resolution selector by @Depal1 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/327
* Only allow one window to be opened + Quit when window is closed by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/431
### Other Changes
* Add issue template by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/197
* Issue Templates by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/199
* [Localization] Updated Chinese (Simplified) localization by @Wind-Explorer in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/200

* Icon Updates by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/243
* [Enhancement] Improved app & IPA library UI by @Wind-Explorer in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/246

name: Pre-release 2.0.0-beta.1

name: Release 1.1.1 Hotfix
body:
## Changes (Short)
* Fixed an issue where applications would not get properly signed.
* The Genshin account switcher now includes TW/HK and Asia.
* The installation of Xcode command line tools is now more user friendly.
* Added vertical screen mode.

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at 1.1.1 -->

## What's Changed
### Exciting New Features üéâ
* Feat: ‚ú® Added vertical 720 screen resolution and refactoring to the getter by @JoseMoreville in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/180
### Other Changes
* Better clear app preferences error checking by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/163
* Removed warning in Installer class by @castlele in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/160
* remove nightly update channel by @Candygoblen123 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/165
* In-app Xcode CLI Tools Install by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/167
* Fix codesigning issue introduced in #143 by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/172
* refactor: Use discardableResult to suppress warning by @KhoraLee in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/178
* Bump build number + Add Asian Genshin servers by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/177
* Release Hotfix 1.1.1 by @Depal1 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/181

## New Contributors
* @castlele made their first contribution in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/160

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/compare/1.1.0...1.1.1

name: Release 1.1.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at 1.1.0 -->

## What's Changed
It has been a while since the last release.
This release contains lots of community work. Big big thanks to our community ‚ù§Ô∏è
**Disclaimer:** The 3rd gen model identifier must be kept selected for some games. Conversely, games could perform worse (blurriness and stutters); for instance on Genshin Impact.

See https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/164 for **TLDR**.

### Exciting New Features üéâ
* Add 2022 M2 Macbook Air to Notched macs. by @Dippyskoodlez in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/44
* Move the app links checkbox into the View menu by @ohaiibuzzle in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/71
* feat: Implement Sparkle Updater by @Candygoblen123 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/45
* Adding account management for Genshin and windowed fullscreen menu by @JoseMoreville in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/108
* feature: ‚ú® Now you can switch between Ipad models on app settings. by @JoseMoreville in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/150
* Feat ‚ú® Delete in-game preferences by @JoseMoreville in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/156
### Other Changes
* Improved icon scaling by @zanderp25 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/39
* fixed: Change the update url to fit new update file format by @ohaiibuzzle in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/37
* readme.md: add homebrew tap/cask info by @hayatofujii in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/47
* style: :art: xcode CLI install button style is now consistent by @JoseMoreville in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/54
* Changed old PlayCover UI in README.md to new one by @ZhichGaming in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/55
* Feat: Added help menu links by @ZhichGaming in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/56
* ‚ú® much more cleaner & nicer UI by @Wind-Explorer in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/61
* feat: Menu bar related changes by @ohaiibuzzle in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/63
* Revert "feat: Menu bar related changes" by @Depal1 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/66
* Menu bar changes (again) by @ohaiibuzzle in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/68
* fix: disable tabs in PlayCover by @ohaiibuzzle in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/69
* spelling and grammar by @williamli0707 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/13
* feat: Added localizations for most UI elements by @ohaiibuzzle in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/46
* Fixed typos in source code, and removed unused button styles by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/74
* Removed 'Colr' class and references to old PlayCover pink by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/77
* feat: Add SwiftLint by @Candygoblen123 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/83
* Fixes SoundDeviceService, a deprecation, changes error alert title by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/82
* Removed a few things I forgot by @zanderp25 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/78
* fix: Disable swiftlint on build actions and create SwiftLint action by @Candygoblen123 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/88
* Moved 'Export to Sideloadly' and 'Download more apps' buttons to the menu bar by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/91
* Remove deprecated and unused Objective-C services by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/81
* UI Fixes and removal of some depreciation warnings by @Candygoblen123 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/96
* Revert "Push updates to sparkle for nightly releases" by @Depal1 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/109
* Bump PlayTools to 1.1.5 by @Depal1 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/111
* Updated info, instructions, and grammar in Readme by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/113
* Add DocC to PlayCover by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/114
* Fix shell crash by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/118
* README Updates by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/119
* fix: Update account switcher UI by @Candygoblen123 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/120
* Revamped localization system (much more accurate and up to date) by @Wind-Explorer in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/86
* [May be breaking] Adding option to disable display timeout per-app by @ohaiibuzzle in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/95
* (related to #86) Updating string keys for AppView.swift by @Wind-Explorer in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/121
* Completed french localisation by @ZhichGaming in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/122
* French localization quick fix and change of documentation source by @Depal1 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/127
* fix: Change raw key string to NSLocalizedString by @KhoraLee in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/131
* refactor: Reimplement SoundDeviceService with CoreAudio by @KhoraLee in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/130
* fix: Change wrong key strings in InstallVM by @KhoraLee in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/132
* [i18n]: Add and improve zh-Hans translation by @Bill-Haku in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/9
* Add traditional Chinese translation by @rootmelo92118 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/53
* Prepare for 1.1.0 by @Candygoblen123 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/134
* fix: Fix infinity loop in SetupView's alert modal by @KhoraLee in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/133
* Refactor App Model Structure + Remove remaining `swiftlint: disable` statements by @IsaacMarovitz in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/143
* fix: removing black bars when auto window size is enabled by @JoseMoreville in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/146
* Adding Japanese Localization by @Animenosekai in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/142
* Refined UI since last few big UI changes by @Wind-Explorer in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/135
* [enhancement] Let user know upon install about overestimate of Xcode CLI Tool install prompt by @Wind-Explorer in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/129
* Fixed Encrypted Mach-O detection by @ohaiibuzzle in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/149
* fix: Reset all settings not resetting all settings by @ohaiibuzzle in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/152
* Bump PlayTools to 1.1.6 by @Depal1 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/153
* [Enhancement] Improved device picker UI by @Wind-Explorer in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/158

## New Contributors
* @Dippyskoodlez made their first contribution in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/44
* @ohaiibuzzle made their first contribution in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/37
* @hayatofujii made their first contribution in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/47
* @JoseMoreville made their first contribution in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/54
* @Wind-Explorer made their first contribution in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/61
* @williamli0707 made their first contribution in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/13
* @Candygoblen123 made their first contribution in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/83
* @KhoraLee made their first contribution in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/131
* @Bill-Haku made their first contribution in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/9
* @rootmelo92118 made their first contribution in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/53
* @Animenosekai made their first contribution in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/142

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/compare/1.0.7...1.1.0

name: Release 1.0.7
body:
- Remove Firebase SDK
- Fixed notarization, no more codesign / extra security setting step
- Stability fixes
- Revert PlayTools iPad identifier. Fixed https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/issues/24
- Remove `ldid` dependency
- UI Improvements
- New Logo. Thanks to https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/25
- And many improvements, big thanks to our community ‚ù§Ô∏è

name: Release 1.0.6
body:
## Changes (Short)
- Support for Blue Archive JP
- Fixes compatibility regressions introduced post 1.0.0
- Modifies English prompts and messages
- CI builds

## What's Changed
* Some spelling and grammar corrections by @Depal1 in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/2
* Rename italian translation to Localizable.strings and putting it into it.lproj by @ZhichGaming in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/3

## New Contributors
* @Depal1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/2
* @ZhichGaming made their first contribution in https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/pull/3

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/PlayCover/PlayCover/compare/1.0.4...1.0.6
